Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.output

this package contains the NiReports aggregated-phase-specific classes and interfaces.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NiReportDataVisitor<K>
    a visitor for NiReportData, which is also disguising as a NiReportOutputBuilder
    NiReportOutputBuilder<K>
    a generic interface for converting the result of running a NiReport into an arbitrary object
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CellFormatter
    a CellVisitor used to transform instances of NiOutCell into instances of ReportCell
    NiColumnReportData
    a flattened leaf region of a report output (see ColumnReportData)
    NiGroupReportData
    a flattened non-leaf node of a report output (see GroupReportData)
    NiReportData
    a flattened report output subregion (a flattened counterpart of ReportData)
    NiReportDataOutputter
    a visitor which does reductions on ReportData (both vertical and horizontal reductions), thus converting NiReports disaggregated structures into NiReports-output aggregated (flattened) structures
    NiReportDateFormatter
    a formatter which converts dates in different calendars
    NiReportExecutor
    a thin layer above NiReportsEngine which converts the output to some external API and also adds support for report run notification
    NiReportFilterResult  
    NiReportHtmlRenderer
    renders the result of running a NiReport to a html string.
    NiReportOutputCleaner
    visitor which makes the final cleanup of data for the NiReports outputs.
    NiReportRunResult
    a container for the artefacts of running a report in NiReportsEngine
    NiReportsFormatter
    Part of the (NiReportsCore, AmpReportsSchema, Reports API) intersection - translates NiOut output into ReportsAPI output.
    NiReportVoidnessChecker
    returns true IFF the report contains no value in a given CellColumn
    NiRowId  

Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.output Description

this package contains the NiReports aggregated-phase-specific classes and interfaces. No schema-specific (e.g. AMP-specific) code should go in this package!, as it might be extracted for other projects
